Name: Planet Guardian VR
About the game: Planet Guardian VR is an Action room-scale VR game in which you protect planets from very bad incoming asteroids. To fulfill your mission you need to use your controllers as weapons to destroy the asteroids. Each level brings a new challenge, be it by the speed, matter or placement of the asteroids. Beware behind you, there might be a hidden asteroid!
